mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT FROM(SELECT RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(RECIPE_QNT, '') AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE AS NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE AS FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE) AS REG_DATE, NVL(RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(RECIPE_IMAGE, '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO ORDER BY BBS_READ_CNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.RECIPE_CODE) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM RECIPE_INFO A , CATEGORY_NATION B WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.NATION_CODE = #{searchType}
AND A.RECIPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND A.NATION_CODE = B.NATION_CODE

SELECT RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(RECIPE_QNT, 0) AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE AS NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE AS FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(RECIPE_IMAGE, '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO WHERE RECIPE_CODE = #{value}

SELECT NVL(IRDNT_AMOUNT, '') AS IRDNT_AMOUNT, NVL(IRDNT_NAME, '') AS IRDNT_NAME, RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, IRDNT_TYPE_CODE AS IRDNT_TYPE_CODE FROM RECIPE_IRDNT WHERE RECIPE_CODE = #{value} AND IRDNT_TYPE_CODE = 3060001 ORDER BY IRDNT_TYPE_CODE ASC

SELECT NVL(COOKING_ORDER, 0) AS COOKING_ORDER, NVL(COOKING_IMAGE, '') AS COOKING_IMAGE, RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(COOKING_EXPLAN, '') AS COOKING_EXPLAN FROM RECIPE_COOKING WHERE RECIPE_CODE = #{value} ORDER BY COOKING_ORDER ASC

SELECT NVL(IRDNT_AMOUNT, '') AS IRDNT_AMOUNT, NVL(IRDNT_NAME, '') AS IRDNT_NAME, RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, IRDNT_TYPE_CODE AS IRDNT_TYPE_CODE FROM RECIPE_IRDNT WHERE RECIPE_CODE = #{value} AND IRDNT_TYPE_CODE != 3060001 ORDER BY IRDNT_TYPE_CODE ASC

SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT FROM(SELECT B.RECIPE_CODE, B.RECIPE_NAME, B.RECIPE_QNT, B.RECIPE_TIME, B.NATION_CODE, B.FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') AS REG_DATE, B.RECIPE_INTRO, B.RECIPE_IMAGE, B.USER_ID, B.BBS_READ_CNT FROM USER_INFO A, RECIPE_INFO B WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT FROM (SELECT A.RECIPE_CODE, NVL(A.RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(A.RECIPE_QNT, '') AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(A.RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NVL(A.NATION_CODE, '') AS NATION_CODE, NVL(A.FOOD_CODE, '') AS FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(A.RECIPE_IMAGE, '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(A.BBS_READ_CNT, '') AS BBS_READ_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO A, USER_BOOKMARK B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.RECIPE_CODE = B.RECIPE_CODE
AND A.RECIPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{recipeName} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.RECIPE_INTRO, #{recipeIntro}) > 0
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.RECIPE_CODE) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM RECIPE_INFO A, USER_BOOKMARK B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.RECIPE_CODE = B.RECIPE_CODE
AND A.RECIPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{recipeName} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.RECIPE_INTRO, #{recipeIntro}) > 0
mapper.insert:
SELECT RECIPE_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RECIPE_REPLY ( USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, RECIPE_CODE, REG_DATE, REPLY_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{replyContent}, #{recipeCode}, SYSDATE, #{replySeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, RECIPE_CODE, REG_DATE, USER_NICKNAME, FILE_EXT, REPLY_SEQ FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, RECIPE_CODE, REG_DATE, USER_NICKNAME, FILE_EXT, REPLY_SEQ FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID AS USER_ID, NVL(A.REPLY_CONTENT, '') AS REPLY_CONTENT, A.RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE) AS REG_DATE, NVL(B.USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, NVL(B.FILE_EXT, '') AS FILE_EXT, NVL(A.REPLY_SEQ, 0) AS REPLY_SEQ FROM RECIPE_REPLY A, USER_INFO B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND RECIPE_CODE = #{recipeCode} ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE_RCM_CNT ( USER_ID, RECIPE_CODE, REG_DATE, RCM_CHECK ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{recipeCode}, SYSDATE, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(RECIPE_QNT, '') AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE AS NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE AS FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE) AS REG_DATE, NVL(RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(RECIPE_IMAGE, '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(RCM_CNT, 0) AS RCM_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO ORDER BY RCM_CNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 8

SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(RECIPE_QNT, '') AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE AS NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE AS FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE) AS REG_DATE, NVL(RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(RECIPE_IMAGE, '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(RCM_CNT, 0) AS RCM_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO WHERE FOOD_CODE IN ('3010013', '3010014') ORDER BY RCM_CNT DESC )) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 8

SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, NVL(RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(RECIPE_QNT, '') AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE AS NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE AS FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE) AS REG_DATE, NVL(RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(RECIPE_IMAGE, '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(RCM_CNT, 0) AS RCM_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO WHERE FOOD_CODE IN ('3010021', '3010010', '3010020', '3010002', '3010005', '3010017', '3010016', '3010009', '3010022', '3010019','3010004', '3010003', '3010006', '3010001', '3010007', '3010018') ORDER BY RCM_CNT DESC )) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 8

SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT, RCM_CNT FROM(SELECT RECIPE_CODE, NVL(RECIPE_NAME, '') AS RECIPE_NAME, NVL(RECIPE_QNT, '') AS RECIPE_QNT, NVL(RECIPE_TIME, '') AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MM:SS'), SYSDATE) AS REG_DATE, NVL(RECIPE_INTRO, '') AS RECIPE_INTRO, NVL(RECIPE_IMAGE , '') AS RECIPE_IMAGE, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(RCM_CNT, 0) AS RCM_CNT FROM RECIPE_INFO ORDER BY RCM_CNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, RECIPE_CODE, REG_DATE, FILE_EXT, REPLY_SEQ FROM RECIPE_REPLY WHERE REPLY_SEQ = #{value}
